name: Vermintide Collection
description:
Get the full Vermintide experience with the Vermintide Collection, containing Warhammer: End Times - Vermintide and Warhammer: Vermintide 2. Fight together with your friends against hordes of enemies in these brutal 4-player co-op action games set in the Warhammer Fantasy Battles world.


Warhammer: Vermintide 2 © Copyright Games Workshop Limited 2018.
